doc.field: Records of the Office of the President, Linda G. Mills
Records of the Office of the President, Linda G. Mills

Websites documenting the office of the NYU president designate, Linda G. Mills. The websites contain a biography of Mills, her job announcement by the Board of Trustees, messages from Mills to the NYU community, strategic plan for NYU, the Presidential Internship Program, and a listing of her publications and films. The websites also documents the transition from president designate to president of NYU.

The Inauguration Week website documents the week-long celebration of the inauguration of Linda G. Mills as the 17th president of New York University. The website contains a video of the inauguration ceremony and event descriptions.

Crawl was limited to domains and subdomains of nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/president-designate and nyu.edu/content/nyu/en/about/leadership-university-administration/office-of-the-president in order to remain within the collection scope and data constraints.

Due to technical or privacy issues, archived websites may not be exact copies of the original website at the time of the web crawl. Certain file types will not be captured dependent on how they are embedded in the site. Other parts of websites that the crawler has difficulty capturing includes Javascript, streaming content, database-driven content, and highly interactive content. Full-Text searches of archived websites are available at https://archive-it.org/organizations/567.
